title: Brick Lane
creator_credit: Ruby Films, Film4 Productions, Ingenious Media, Alison Owen, Chris Collins, Laura Jones, Sarah Gavron and Abi Morgan
brief_description: The grind of daily life as a Brick Lane Bangladessi as seen through the eyes of Nazneen (Chatterjee), who at 17 enters an arranged marriage with Chanu (Kaushik). Years later, living in east London with her family, she meets a young man Karim (Simpson).

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.
